repairedDockerfile:
FROM python:3.4
RUN apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends gettext -y && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
ENV PYTHONUNBUFFERED 1
RUN mkdir /code
ADD requirements.txt /code/
ADD . /code/
WORKDIR /code
RUN cp .env.docker .env
RUN pip install --no-cache-dir -r dev-requirements.txt
